comments.comments_text: Goal - 1:0! Moses Simon laid the ball off to Randal Kolo Muani (Nantes), who shot from close range into the bottom right corner, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Quentin Merlin (Nantes) is teed up on the edge of the box by Osman Bukari, and his howitzer of a shot into the top left corner gives the keeper no chance. 2:0.
